content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I please have your name?
Nice to meet you, Michael! Could you please provide your address so I can confirm we're able to service your area?
Thank you! Let me check if we cover that location for electrical service.

I'm sorry, but I'm having trouble confirming service availability for your address due to a technical issue. I will need to escalate this to our human team to assist you further. Someone will reach out to you soon. Thank you for your patience.
reason: System error during service area check
